name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
objective: Provide income support to all landholding farmers.
benefit: Rs. 6,000 per year in three equal installments directly to farmers’ bank accounts.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
objective: Crop insurance to protect farmers against crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, or diseases.
benefit: Low premium rates; claim support for crop damage.

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
objective: Promote soil testing and balanced use of fertilizers.
benefit: Farmers receive soil health cards with crop-wise nutrient recommendations.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
objective: Promote organic farming and sustainable agriculture.
benefit: Financial assistance to farmers for organic input and certification.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Scheme
objective: Provide short-term credit to farmers for cultivation and other needs.
benefit: Easy and low-interest credit access via KCC cards.

name: e-NAM (National Agriculture Market)
objective: Online trading platform for agricultural commodities.
benefit: Better price discovery, transparency, and digital transactions.

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
objective: “Har Khet Ko Pani” – Improve irrigation efficiency and water use.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
objective: Holistic development of agriculture and allied sectors.
benefit: Funding to states for agriculture infrastructure and innovation.

name: National Mission on Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
objective: Promote sustainable farming practices to deal with climate change.
benefit: Support for water conservation, soil management, and agroforestry.
